short_summary: The department of public works and government services (pwgsc), real property branch requires a qualified contractor to provide construction management services for an office accommodation and special purpose space modernization. The work must be completed in the leased premises of the Joseph Shepard Building located at 4900 Yonge Street, Toronto, Ontario.
